languages.text: "Человек и впрямь опаснее всего живого, но истинный ужас не имеет привычных нам плоти и крови".
"It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."
languages.original_text: "Человек и впрямь опаснее всего живого, но истинный ужас не имеет привычных нам плоти и крови".

traits.locale_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “确实，人类比任何动物都要更加危险，但真正的恐怖，并不会以我们熟悉的血肉之躯展现在我们面前。”
languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: “确实，人类比任何动物都要更加危险，但真正的恐怖，并不会以我们熟悉的血肉之躯展现在我们面前。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Es cierto que los humanos son más peligrosos que cualquier animal, pero el verdadero terror no viene en la carne y hueso que conocemos».
languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto que los humanos son más peligrosos que cualquier animal, pero el verdadero terror no viene en la carne y hueso que conocemos».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「人間はどんな動物よりも危険であることは事実だが、真の恐怖は身近な血肉に身を包んで現れるものではない」
languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: 「人間はどんな動物よりも危険であることは事実だが、真の恐怖は身近な血肉に身を包んで現れるものではない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Es stimmt, Menschen sind gefährlicher als jedes Tier, doch wahrer Schrecken kommt nicht in vertrautes Fleisch und Blut gehüllt."
languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: "Es stimmt, Menschen sind gefährlicher als jedes Tier, doch wahrer Schrecken kommt nicht in vertrautes Fleisch und Blut gehüllt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il est vrai que l'humain est plus dangereux que tout autre animal, mais la vraie terreur ne s'habille pas de chair et de sang. »
languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que l'humain est plus dangereux que tout autre animal, mais la vraie terreur ne s'habille pas de chair et de sang. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

languages.text: "İnsanların tüm hayvanlardan daha tehlikeli olduğu gerçektir ama has tehlike, bildiğimiz et ve kandan gelmez."
languages.original_text: "It is true that humans are more dangerous than any animal, but true terror does not come garbed in familiar flesh and blood."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanların tüm hayvanlardan daha tehlikeli olduğu gerçektir ama has tehlike, et ve kanla kaplı bir pakette gelmez."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
